name: QuirkySolar-With7Solartopics
0:
”Alexa, open quirky solar”
”Alexa, ask quirky solar to give me fact number two”
”Alexa, ask quirky solar for one”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quirky solar
des:
Welcome to Solar Facts. Here you will find helpful short voice notes on fundamentals of solar. You can say the fact number you are interested in. We currently have for you seven topics 
1 Temperature losses in helioscope 
2 STC versus NOCT in solar 
3 Performance Ratio
4 Specific Yield . 
5 NEC Code
6 DC/AC Ratio Part 1
7 DC/AC Ratio Part 2

What is it going to be?
You can say "Alexa, one" for listening to Temperature losses in Helioscope
You can say "Alexa, two" for tuning in to STC versus NOCT in solar
and so on...

Best way to reach me is through tathagata [at] tathagatamitra [dot] com for any suggestions/ feedback
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
